title: Fantasy/RPG Music Pack Volume 2
description: Add epicness and fantasy to your games with these 20 tracks (divided in 83 tracks to create interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price
longDescription:
RPG/Fantasy Music Pack Volume 2

After the success of the volume 1, we've created a new set of soundtracks that can be complemented with the first volume.

Add epicness and fantasy to your games with these 20 tracks (divided in 83 tracks to create interactive music) that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.


YouTube link (listen to the video preview of the tracks)

Tracklist PDF (83 tracks)


More about the pack:

- This pack can be complemented with: RPG/Fantasy Music Pack

- This pack can be complemented with: JPRG Music

- The songs on the pack can be used in various situations in the gameplay.

- This fantasy music tracks are perfect to set up the RPG/Fantasy atmosphere.

- Made with both orchestral and medieval instruments to give the RPG vibe.

- Music for a variety of scenarios (nature, village, tavern, caves, battles, sacred places, etc...)

Â
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • The songs on the pack can be used in various situations in the gameplay.
  • This fantasy music tracks are perfect to set up the RPG/Fantasy atmosphere.
  • Made with both orchestral and medieval instruments to give the RPG vibe.
  • Music for a variety of scenarios (nature, village, tavern, caves, battles, sacred places, etc...)


Number of Audio Wavs: 83

Number of Audio Cues: 83

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 41 minutes and 44 seconds

Illustration credits: https://pixabay.com/photos/photoshop-horse-road-the-way-4437023/
